scripts.build:children: npx concurrently -n "secure-biometric-integrator,sign-in-with-esignet,react-secure-biometric-integrator,react-sign-in-with-esignet" -c "bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgRed.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run build:sbi:dev" "npm run build:siwe:dev" "npm run build:rsbi:dev" "npm run build:rsiwe:dev"
scripts.build:children:dev: npx concurrently -n "secure-biometric-integrator,sign-in-with-esignet,react-secure-biometric-integrator,react-sign-in-with-esignet" -c "bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgRed.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run build:sbi:dev" "npm run build:siwe:dev" "npm run build:rsbi:dev" "npm run build:rsiwe:dev"
scripts.build:children:release: npx concurrently -n "secure-biometric-integrator,sign-in-with-esignet,react-secure-biometric-integrator,react-sign-in-with-esignet" -c "bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgRed.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run build:sbi:release" "npm run build:siwe:release" "npm run build:rsbi:release" "npm run build:rsiwe:release"
scripts.build:all:children: npx concurrently -n "dev,release" -c "bgCyan.italic,bgRed.italic" "npm run build:children:dev" "npm run build:children:release"
scripts.build:all:dev: npm run build && npm run build:children:dev && npm run build:children:release
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:all:children
scripts.build:dev:release: npm run build:all:dev && npm run checkout:release && npm run build:children:release
scripts.sbook-children: npx concurrently "npm run sbook:siwe"  "npm run sbook:sbi" "npm run sbook:rsiwe"  "npm run sbook:rsbi"
scripts.sbook-parent: npx wait-on http://localhost:6001 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6002 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6003 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6004 && npm run storybook
scripts.sbook: npx concurrently "npm run sbook-children" "npm run sbook-parent"
scripts.publish: npm run build:all && npm run deploy
